Creating or Editing Titles

When you create a chart, you can insert titles for the left, right, top, or bottom of the chart. These titles can serve as overall titles or names for the axes.

The sections below describe how you can create and edit titles in the Windows and Cross-Platform clients.

Using the Windows Client to Create or Edit Titles

Using the Windows client you can choose between two methods for creating and editing titles.

To create or edit titles for your chart in the Windows client:

  1. Do one of the following:

    • Select the Chart Options button on the Chart window toolbar, and click Titles.

    • Click the Titles button on the Chart window toolbar.

    The Titles dialog opens.

  2. Enter or edit the contents of the Top, Left, Right, or Bottom text boxes.

  3. Click Apply to make these changes to the chart. Moving to another tab of the Titles dialog is equivalent to clicking Apply.

  4. Click OK to close the dialog.

Using the Cross-Platform Client to Create or Edit Titles

Use the Chart window toolbar to change or edit titles in the Cross-Platform client.

To create or edit titles for your chart in the Cross-Platform client:

  1. Click the Edit Titles button on the Chart window toolbar. The Edit Titles dialog opens.

  2. Enter or edit the contents of the Top, Left, Right, or Bottom text boxes.

  3. Click Apply to make changes to the chart and keep the Edit Titles dialog open.

  4. Click OK to close the dialog.
